thread.title: Swansea City make surprise swoop on Spanish side Getafe for Argentinian playmaker Emi Buendia
thread.title_full: Swansea City make surprise swoop on Spanish side Getafe for Argentinian playmaker Emi Buendia

author: smorgan
title: Swansea City make surprise swoop on Spanish side Getafe for Argentinian playmaker Emi Buendia
text:
Emi award Swansea City make surprise swoop on Spanish side Getafe for Argentinian playmaker Emi Buendia 
The Under-20 international wants to quit the Second Division outfit and is willing to join Swans on loan Exclusive Comments Swansea City are making a surprise swoop on Spanish side Getafe for Argentinian play-maker Emi Buendia. 
The Under-20 international wants to quit the Second Division outfit and is willing to join Swans on loan to put himself into the shop window. EFE 2 Emi Buendia could be on his way to Swansea – but it may just be a loan deal 
Buendia was a big hit in his homeland as a kid and joined Real Madrid before signing for city neighbours Getafe. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Swansea news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
There will be no problem with a work permit as Buendia has lived in Spain for several years and even got a call-up to play for their national youth sides. 
Buendia signed a long-term deal with Getafe in the summer but will be sold if he impresses, with Swansea first in the queue as long as they stay up. AP:Associated Press Emi Buendia has big game experience, having played against the likes of Neymar at the Nou Camp Liverpool 2-3 Swansea : Llorente brace leaves Klopp’s title dream in tatters New Swansea manager Paul Clement excited to land top job at Swansea 
Paul Clement's side currently sit 17th in the Premier League thanks to their remarkable 3-2 win at Liverpool . 
The Swans are two points above the drop zone and face Southampton at home tomorrow evening.
